status_updates.description: ARK Desktop Wallet v2.8 is now available! This update is mandatory. This Wallet update includes support for Core v2.6, MultiSig, MultiPay, Business & Bridgechain registration transactions, IPFS, delegate resignation, Nonce support and much more! The latest PIVX iOS Mobile wallet v1.1.2 has just been approved and released on the App Store!

It now supports the new v7 blocks and protocol version allowing it to sync with the latest 4.x wallet nodes.

Greetings users, today we‚Äôd love to share our new release for the BCD Pay app, below is a list of improvements and new features included in this update:
- Ethereum support
- 24-word recovery seed phrase support
- UI improvements
- Nexo and Binance Hot wallets

Beam 2020 Week #6

Another busy week for Beam, with the roadmap update from the Beam Foundation, iOS release, and some great things happening in the community.

Beam Release

Team Beam
